mapper.select: select name,isInUse,priorityLevel,ISNULL(discount,0) AS discount from AA_SalePriceSource where isInUse = 1 and name != '客户促销价' order by priorityLevel asc

select TOP 1 t2.taxPrice as price,t2.idunit,t5.code,t5.name,t5.isMainUnit,t2.idInventory from SA_SaleDelivery t1,SA_SaleDelivery_b t2,AA_Inventory t3,AA_department t4,AA_unit t5 where t1.id = t2.idSaleDeliveryDTO and t2.idInventory = t3.id and t1.idDepartment = t4.id and t3.code = #{idinventory} and t4.code = #{iddepartment} and t2.idunit = t5.id and t1.voucherState = 189 order by t1.createdtime desc

select TOP 1 t1.unittaxprice as price from AA_DepartmentInventoryPriceTrace t1,AA_Inventory t3,AA_department t4,AA_unit t5 where t1.idinventory = t3.id and t1.idDepartment = t4.id and t3.code = #{idinventory} and t4.code = #{iddepartment} and t1.idunit = t5.id and t5.code = #{code} order by t1.createdtime desc
